title: Pawan Kalyan gets Panchayat Raj & Rural Development￼
excerpt: Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu has allocated portfolios to his cabinet members. Jana Sena chief Pawan Kalyan was designated as Deputy Chief Minister and allocated Panchayat Raj, Rural Development, Rural Water Supply, Forest, Science and Technology. Nara Lokesh gets Human Resource Development, IT Electronics and Communications. Kinjarapu Atchannaidu gets Agriculture and Cooperation, Nadendla Manohar Food
author: Tattva News Team
contentHTML:
Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu has allocated portfolios to his cabinet members. Jana Sena chief Pawan Kalyan was designated as Deputy Chief Minister and allocated Panchayat Raj, Rural Development, Rural Water Supply, Forest, Science and Technology.

Nara Lokesh gets Human Resource Development, IT Electronics and Communications. Kinjarapu Atchannaidu gets Agriculture and Cooperation, Nadendla Manohar Food and Civil Supplies, Payyavula Keshav Finance and Legislative Affairs and Vangalapudi Anitha Home Affairs.

  1. N Chandrababu Naidu (Chief Minister): GAD, Law and Order, Public Enterprises and all other portfolios not allotted to others.
  2. Pavan Kalyan (Deputy Chief Minister): Panchayat Raj, Rural Development and Rural Water Supply, Environment, Science and Technology
  3. Nara Lokesh       :IT, Human Resources, Real Time Governance
  4. Kinjarapu Atchannaidu : Agriculture, Cooperation, Marketing, Animal Husbendary, Dairy Development and Fisharies
  5. Kollu Ravindra     : Mines & Geology, Excise
  6. Nadendla Manohr   : Foor & Civil Supplies, Consumer Affairs,
  7. Ponguru Narayana  : Municipal Administration and Urban Development
  8. Anitha Vangalapudi  : Home Affairs, Disaster Management
  9. Sathyakumar Yadav  : Health, Family Welfare and Medical Education
  10. Dr Nimmala Ramanaidu : Water Resource Development
  11. N Mohammad Farooq    : Law & Justice, Minority Welfare
  12. Anam Ramanarayana Reddy : Endowments
  13. Payyavula Kesav    : Finance, Planning, Commercial Taxes, Legislative Affairs
  14. Anagani Sathya Prasad : Revenue, Stamps & Registrations
  15. Kolusu Parthasarathy     : Housing, I&PR,
  16. Dr D Bala Veeranjaneya Swamy: Social Welfare, Disabled & Senior Citizens Welfare, Sachivalayam & Village Volunteer,
  17. Goottipati Ravi Kumar    : Energy
  18. Kandula Durgesh            : Tourism, Culture & Cinematography,
  19. Gummadi Sandhya Rani  : Women & Child Welfare, Tribal Welfare
  20. BC Janardhana Reddy   : Roads & Buildings, Infrastructure & Investments,
  21. T G Bharath         : Industries & Commerce, Food Processing,
  22. S Savitha              : B C Welfare, EWS Welfare, Handlooms & Textiles
  23. Vasamsetty Subhash : Labour, Factories, Boilers & Insurance Medical Services
  24. Kondapalli Srinivas  : MSME, SERP, NRI Empowerment & Relations
  25. Mandipalli Ram Prasad Reddy : Transport, Youth & Sports
